task:
Investigate and fix the messaging feature for user everestode68@gmail.com in the POMI app. The user cannot see their messages. Here's what we know:

1. There are messages in the database for this user (ID: 691251f6801854f39b07034c)
2. The backend is running on localhost:3000
3. The messaging system uses MongoDB aggregation pipelines
4. There are TWO users named 'Everest' in the database - one is admin (marakihay@gmail.com), the other is this user (everestode68@gmail.com)

Please:
1. Check the database to confirm messages exist for this user
2. Test the API endpoint GET /api/v1/messages with this user's auth token
3. Identify why messages aren't showing up
4. Fix any issues found
5. Verify the fix works

The message controller is in: backend/src/controllers/messageController.ts
